title: Porklips now
brief_description: Starring William Gray, Ernie Fosselius, John Brent, Mark Lee, Jim Turner. A comedy which casts a running loop parody over ‘Apocalypse Now’. Features Martin Sheen lookalike William Gray as “Dullard” who is sent to deal with a renegade butcher whose low, low prices threaten the profits of the Meatcutters Protective Association.
